content.rendered:
Fry’s Traditional Burgers in a pan-fried sandwich with cheese and B-Well Mayo

Ingredients

Ingredients
Red onion
B-Well garlic oil
Cherry tomatoes
Salt and pepper
1 Fry’s Traditional Burger
2 Slices of bread
Dairy free cheese
Margarine

Directions

Heat a frying pan with some B-Well garlic oil. First in with the patty, then add the chopped onions and sliced cherry tomatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Prepare your slices of bread with a layer of dairy free cheese then top with the onion and tomato mix. Follow with the patty and the some more cheese. Top with the other slice of bread and fry in canola B-Well olive oil blend with a knob of margarine spread until brown on both sides.

Serve straight away.
